TopicTitle: What Are Things You've Heard That Made You Facepalm?

Articles.Content:
Here's two relating to gaming. Because I'm not high and mighty.

"X game should be banned"

Yes, a game offends your specific sensibilities no matter what they should be, it shouldn't exist.

"Games should be art"

Read my signature, it accurately summarizes my opinion on this statement.
[This](http://www.buzzfeed.com/daves4/we-cant-have-nice-things#.tkrgEmpo), and about everything else on twitter and facebook.

> 
> [This](http://www.buzzfeed.com/daves4/we-cant-have-nice-things#.tkrgEmpo), and about everything else on twitter and facebook.

![HR91Vog1Fxu5nyAjFD8pCnO9T0w9Mg9xF-Mj2SLZW64?size=1024x768&size_mode=2](https://photos-3.dropbox.com/t/2/AACyILdgzIcAgh4vcekm6zLQ9Obug6XosQpzn6Mrr7wkVQ/12/104116724/png/32x32/1/_/1/2/Screenshot%202015-05-29%20at%2008.03.39.png/CPTj0jEgASACIAMgBCAFIAYgBygBKAI/HR91Vog1Fxu5nyAjFD8pCnO9T0w9Mg9xF-Mj2SLZW64?size=1024x768&size_mode=2)

REALLY!?!?!?!?

One of my friends once said that "When neil armstrong whent to the moon he planted some nuclear bombs and blew up the alien homes that the aliens build" ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif) I facepalmed so hard my forehead hurt.

> 
> [https://photos-3.dropbox.com/t/2/AACyILdgzIcAgh4vcekm6zLQ9Obug6XosQpzn6Mrr7wkVQ/12/104116724/png/32x32/1/_/1/2/Screenshot%202015-05-29%20at%2008.03.39.png/CPTj0jEgASACIAMgBCAFIAYgBygBKAI/HR91Vog1Fxu5nyAjFD8pCnO9T0w9Mg9xF-Mj2SLZW64?size=1024x768&size_mode=2](https://photos-3.dropbox.com/t/2/AACyILdgzIcAgh4vcekm6zLQ9Obug6XosQpzn6Mrr7wkVQ/12/104116724/png/32x32/1/_/1/2/Screenshot%202015-05-29%20at%2008.03.39.png/CPTj0jEgASACIAMgBCAFIAYgBygBKAI/HR91Vog1Fxu5nyAjFD8pCnO9T0w9Mg9xF-Mj2SLZW64?size=1024x768&size_mode=2)
> REALLY!?!?!?!?

Yes.

#Pleasestoppeople!
That some people say ever going into space is a hoax, it was all done on Earth. \*facepalm\*

I'm looking at Yahoo Answers, and I'm joining.

Time to help these people!

I'll start posting stuff. I'm "D" by the way.

[https://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20150521185902AA0isRP](https://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20150521185902AA0isRP)

"Um, sorry to bother you but how do you spell spell? Wait, never mind, I'll type it in to google"

My friend, after a 4 hour Civilization V Game.

> 
> "Um, sorry to bother you but how do you spell spell? Wait, never mind, I'll type it in to google"
> **My friend, after a 4 hour Civilization V Game**.

To be fair, Civ V and other such games can have a high brain-frying potential, especially after 4 hours. He was probably just tired or couldn't think too well.
I see your point. Still, it was hysterical ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

"Philip Glass sucks. His music is just some stuff repeated over and over again." \*goes back to listening to Justin Cyrus' 235898295th album that consists of 4 repeated notes with a poem being read over it\*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-31T21:03:52Z" title="05/31/2015 09:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 31, 2015</time> by mythbusters844**
some might find this offensive i saw it some were but i dont know were so i will just read the news headline "man comes home to pregnant wife after being in Iraq for 2 years"

> 
> some might find this offensive i saw it some were but i dont know were so i will just read the news headline "man comes home to pregnant wife after being in Iraq for 2 years"

[Did you read the article to find out if he had been in Iraq for the entire time?](http://www.snopes.com/photos/military/welcomehome.asp)

Singaporean Woman:

1) "Motorcycles are Dangerous" - she does not ride a motorcycle nor gives any reasons why she thinks motorcycles are dangerous, when prompted. However, **everyone in the country above a certain age will repeat this same exact phrase to you** (also without providing justification or useful safety suggestions). Along with asking you the same social questions in the exact same order, what is this, a nation of robots?

2) "Why do bikers all wear jackets" - when explained, she doesn't seem to "get it" that random road debris hitting you at 60mph is extremely painful. Ditto for constant wind blast and all the other things she'd never experienced in life.

> 
> "Motorcycles are Dangerous"... without providing justification

> 
> ...random road debris hitting you at 60mph...

What?

> 
> What?

Like bugs, rocks, etc.
"Mars has no atmosphere" and "there's no gravity on the moon".
Motorcycles are great, we have to get transplant donors someplace ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Like bugs, rocks, etc.

That was more a reaction to the lack of justification of motorcycle riding having dangers being followed by the specific need to wear safety equipment.

"60% of people in this world are stupid. I'm with the other 30%"

GG
"Was there a World War I?"

"Ham is not a very attractive meat" - My Father, 2014

Or

"I sometimes like to give a courtesy flush" - Peer from my class on the topic of toilets/outhouses, 2014

> 
> "Ham is not a very attractive meat" - My Father, 2014

I agree with him. Unless it's cooked just so it's usually greasy or hard to chew. Plus it's a very "dry" meat and usually loads of salt is added to it, which just exacerbates the dryness. Especially bacon, everybody think it's a wonder food but I think it's horrible.

Personally, I think I found my winner: "WW2 never happened".

And now... I have a headache.
